text: I'm here with the galaxy s7 and it kills
the iphone in one key area hardware one
of the features that Samsung
reintroduced into the s7 is water
resistant and that's been a really good
feature just for a peace of mind so if I
drop the phone in water it doesn't fly
the other thing I love about the s7 is
the quick charging this is something the
iphone does not have 50 minutes will
give me like two hours of battery life
is really amazing with the s7s camera
Samsung gave it a 1.7 f-stop that's
compared to the iphone's 2.2 f stuff and
that means it's going to be really
really good for low-light photography
the other thing I love about the s7 is
the new quick focus it is super fast it
makes the iphone focus look really slow
and I try going back to the iphone and
it was just too slow and I couldn't
capture my cats something else that
Samsung reintroduced is the microSD slot
which is found in the SIM card tray
right over here with the iphone it can
get really expensive to get you know
that higher tier of storage whereas this
you get one option and you can add 200
gigabytes more storage with a microSD
card and that's going to be a lot less
than the hundred twenty eight gigabyte
iphone and a brand new feature that
Samsung introduced into its phones is
they always on display which shows you
the time as well as some basic
notifications now it's been really
useful to just sort of have the phone on
my table on my desk glancing over and
checking the time and it's something
that the iphone does not have now of
course Samsung has brought over Samsung
pay from its last galaxy s6 line into
the s7 and Samsung pay is quite frankly
a lot better than Apple pay and that's
because it uses MST when you put your
phone next to a payment terminal the
terminal thinks it's like a credit card
it uses the same kind of technology
which means that it basically works
everywhere whereas with the iphone they
have to upgrade their payment terminals
with NFC technology which is what Apple
pay to use basically what all this means
is that the galaxy s7 outclasses the
iphone in terms of hardware no doubt
hands down
you
